elements.name: Creating a booking

steps.name: the base URL - https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com - is set

a booking with the following details: First name - Steule, Last Name -Bartust, total price - 344, checkin date - 2017-01-01, deposit paid - true, checkout date - 2019-01-01, additional needs - towel, sleepers
a booking is created
the response status code should be 200
the booking details should be returned - true

elements.name: Delete a booking

steps.name: the base URL - https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com - is set
use any existing - true - booking Id as parameter.
a token is requested, with username - admin and password - password123
the booking id is deleted
the booking Id is successfully deleted - 404
